div.p: Greetings. The rest with Mr. Valentin.

Siderhar was informed by Georgius Carly through the proconsul (for he himself went abroad), he knows for certain that the papal [...] in Glarus are fleeing with their treasures, partly to Gr√§pelen, partly elsewhere. This you certainly know; but if you do not, warn the pious people of Glarus, and be vigilant; it is a sign of war and a premonition. Farewell.
To the most distinguished man, Mr. Heinrich Bullinger, his lord.
